page.title: 10HOUSING IN EGGINTON VILLAGE
page.content: The houses in Egginton are mostly new, but quite a few are old. There are lots of houses called something farm like Manor Farm and Peartree Farm. The houses in Elmhurst and Dove Grove are all new houses. One of the biggest is Sir John Every's. He lives at the back of my house. The oldest house in the village is in Main Street. It is oveer 200 years old. Some of the council houses are in Church Road. If you come out of Elmhurst you can see the woods. There is a flood bank that was put there to stop the floods flooding the woods. Nearly every house has a garden. The newest houses are at the back of our school. Daniel Fletcher
